sentence.Network_en: Lucy had strung a banner across the wall saying "Welcome Home Daddy".
sentence.Network_cn: 露西在墙上挂了一条横幅，上面写着“欢迎爸爸回家”。

sentence.Network_en: He hit back angrily, saying such remarks were childishly simplistic.
sentence.Network_cn: 他愤怒地反击，说这些话太过幼稚。

sentence.Network_en: I heard the voices, but couldn't make out what they were saying.
sentence.Network_cn: 我听到有声音，却听不清他们在说些什么。

phrase.cizu_name: as (或 so) the saying goes (或 is)

jx.jx_en_mean: used to introduce or append an expression, drawing attention to its status as a saying or as not part of one's normal language

lj.lj_ly: I am, as the saying goes, burnt out.
lj.lj_ls: 我，正像俗话说的，已筋疲力尽了。

entry.def: A saying is a sentence that people often say and that gives advice or information about human life and experience.

example.ex: We also realize the truth of that old saying: Charity begins at home...
example.tran: 我们也明白了那句老话的道理：仁爱始于家庭。

example.ex: Her favourite saying was: 'There are a lot of people far worse off than me.'
example.tran: 她最喜欢的谚语是：“比上不足，比下有余。”

entry.tran: (尤指宗教或政治领袖的)重要讲话，教诲，名言
entry.def: The sayings of a person, especially a religious or political leader, are important things that they said or pieces of advice that they gave.

example.ex: The sayings of Confucius offer guidance on this matter.
example.tran: 孔子的教诲为此事提供了指引。

means.word_mean: 1. a word or phrase that particular people use in particular situations;

auth_sentence.content: I'm just saying things that everybody can see.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm just saying things that everybody can see.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm just saying things that everybody can see.

auth_sentence.content: Saying that you love all humanity is one thing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Saying that you love all humanity is one thing.

auth_sentence.content: It is the scientists who are saying these things.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is the scientists who are saying these things.

Sentence.sentence: However, Soren Andreasen, a social scientist at Dalberg Global Development Partners who supervised the writing of the report, defended it, saying that it was clear that the numbers were rough estimates.

What does Ronald Reagan mean by saying "government is the problem" (line4, Para.
What does the author mean by saying "savings are the seed corn of a good economic harvest" (Lines 3-4, Para.

Higher education has been able to duck this issue for years, particularly the more selective schools, by saying the responsibility is on the individual student," says Pennington of the Gates Foundation.

sentences.en: Saying and doing are two things.
“There’s no smoke without fire”, as the saying goes.
Of course I’ll visit you in hospital. It goes without saying!
sentences.cn: 我当然会去医院看你，这还用说！

sentences.en: ‘You realize that this is a very responsible job, don’t you?’ ‘Yes, that goes without saying.’
sentences.cn: “你认识到这是一项责任重大的工作，是不是？”“当然，这还用说。”

means.word_mean: 这说明不了什么；也没什么了不起

sentences.en: She’s a better player than me, but that’s not saying much (= because I’m a very bad player).
sentences.cn: 她比我水平高，但也没什么了不起(因为我很差)。
